step_data.thought: Looking at the current page state, I can see that the customer group with ID 1 is already named 'General Retail Customers'. This suggests that the task of changing the name from 'Updated General Customers' to 'General Retail Customers' has already been completed. There's also a success message at the top of the page stating 'You saved the customer group.' which further confirms this. Since the goal has been accomplished, I should inform the user.
step_data.action: stop('The task has already been completed. The customer group with ID 1 is already named "General Retail Customers" as shown in the table. There's also a success message at the top of the page confirming that the group was saved successfully.')
